hero.description: We enable companies to use innovative digital solutions that create lasting impressions. Raise your brand with us!

seoOptimization.title: SEO Optimization
seoOptimization.description: Increase visibility and attract organic traffic with our SEO techniques.

interview.title: Interview
interview.description: We conduct an interview to understand your needs and establish priorities.

design.title: Design
design.description: Based on the collected requirements, we create a graphic design of your website.

implementation.title: Implementation
implementation.description: Our webmasters combine graphics and content into a whole and ensure the site displays well on every device.

acceptance.title: Acceptance and Implementation
acceptance.description: Even before the website is published online, we present you with the final project for review and acceptance.

graphicDesign.title: Graphic Design
graphicDesign.description: Professional website graphic design tailored to the individual needs of the client

mobileVersion.title: Mobile Version
mobileVersion.description: We adapt the site for mobile devices, ensuring a smooth user experience.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: We ensure that the site complies with current privacy and data protection regulations

fastLoading.title: Fast Loading
fastLoading.description: We optimize site loading speed, which translates into better search engine rankings and user satisfaction

seoOptimization.title: SEO Optimization
seoOptimization.description: Increase the visibility of your site in search results through advanced SEO strategies.

trainingAndConsulting.title: Training & Consulting
trainingAndConsulting.description: We offer professional training to help you better manage the website and digital strategies.

additionalFees.question: Are there any additional fees associated with website creation?
additionalFees.answer: Payment for creating a website is one-time. You will receive a detailed quote from us before starting work, which will remain unchanged throughout the project. You can opt for additional services that are chargeable, but they are not mandatory.

seoOptimized.question: Will my new website be optimized for SEO?
seoOptimized.answer: Yes, we create modern websites that comply with the current Google guidelines. This ensures that the sites are prepared for effective positioning in search results.

creationTime.question: How long does the process of creating a website take?
creationTime.answer: Standard websites are created within 48 hours of receiving all necessary information. For more advanced projects, the completion time may be longer.

makingChanges.question: Can I make changes during the website creation process?
makingChanges.answer: Yes, the design process includes three rounds of revisions. You can present your suggestions at any time during the creation of the site.

ownership.question: Will I own the website after the project is completed?
ownership.answer: Yes, after the project is completed, you will receive full rights to the site along with all necessary access for its management and a backup copy.

mobileResponsive.question: Will the site display properly on mobile devices?
mobileResponsive.answer: Yes, all our sites are responsive, meaning they will display correctly on various devices, including tablets, computers, and smartphones.

educationalMaterials.question: Will I receive educational materials on how to manage my website and other useful materials for improving my business's online presence?
educationalMaterials.answer: Yes, after completing the website project, we will provide you with educational materials on managing your site and a guide on how to improve the visibility of your business online.

consultation.title: Do you have any more questions?
consultation.description: Let's arrange a short, free consultation during which we will answer your questions!

second.name: Company Website
second.description: The Company Website is a solution for various industries such as healthcare, accounting, or law, enabling effective presentation of services and strengthening the company's image online.
